item.description:
Saturday ~ September 8, 2012 ~ 9 PM

Marty Beecy and Dan "Big Daddy" Beneke

The Halfway Cafe
51 Main Street, Maynard, MA 01754
TEL: (978) 823-0002
http://www.facebook.com/HalfwayCafe

FREE ~ No Cover Charge Show

The Cafe will feature 8 Meals for $8 visit:
http://www.thehalfwaycafe.com/8for8

Marty Beecy is currently working on his first CD and hopes to complete it later this year. He has been writing short fiction stories for several years and has turned his focus to songwritting for the past 8 years. His last project "Kendrick Square Blues" resulted in a music video that was produced by Claude von Roesgen, and can be viewed online.

Marty Beecy ~ Singer, Songwriter, Guitarist
http://www.reverbnation.com/martybeecymusic
http://www.myspace.com/martybeecymusic
http://www.martybeecy.com/

Marty Beecy is Presented by
Richard Axtman ~ Northern Music
northernmusic@yahoo.com
http://www.myspace.com/northernmusicagency
http://www.facebook.com/richard.axtman
http://www.facebook.com/profile.php?id=100001577514520
item.name: September 8th ~ FREE Marty Beecy and Big Daddy Show in Maynard, Mass
